entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of snow squalls late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
